name: Tetrees
description:
Bottomless Tetris variation with a twist!

Place pieces covered in snow in the winter and hope for the best when the thaw comes!

Use arrow keys to move figures around, Up to rotate.

Music:

"Super Power Cool Dude" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
